name: SCP Area-42 Alpha Build
description:
Welcome to Area-42, one of the many SCP facilities around the world, containing highly dangerous SCP subjects. Area-42 is a Containment Research Storage facility, located in ██████, Alaska, containing SCPs such as SCP-914, SCP-457, and SCP-249.

In this game, you have many objectives based or your team. As a Class-D, you must follow orders and be used as a test subject while Scientists and Guards monitor the test and make sure nothing goes wrong.  (You can also escape the facility as a Class-D) However, Chaos Insurgent Agent, your goal is to set free all SCP subjects and cause chaos throughout the facility. Finally, as an MTF (Mobile Task Force), you must re-contain the escaped SCPs and evacuate all Scientists and Guards. 

Based off of SCP: Containment Breach

Note: If you want to modify the map presets or server configs, they are located in [Game Path]/Area-42_Data/StreamingAssets
